I enjoyed our district work period last week. I appreciate all the businesses who invite me to see what they do for #NC13 on a daily basis. Meeting with constituents is always one of my top priorities. pic.twitter.com/724UcZQVCa

Today is National Vietnam War Veterans Day. According to the @DeptVetAffairs there are still 6.4 million living Vietnam veterans. This week, I signed onto the Welcome Home Vietnam Veteran's Day Resolution to recognize the sacrifice that veterans and their families have made. pic.twitter.com/0FzCx7MDkr

Medications can be administered to hide injuries or dull soreness which is not in the best interest of the horses. This will probably not make any news stories, but I wanted to highlight it. I will continue to support legislation that protects the health and safety of horses. 2/2

This week, I joined as a cosponsor to the Horseracing Integrity Act, which I view as an animal rights bill that would improve horse safety. This bill would prohibit the use of any medication within 24 hours of a horse's race, which I think is important. 1/2 pic.twitter.com/2t9HHqHIHZ

I’m extremely disappointed in today’s ruling. Judge Osteen sided with pro-abortion groups over unborn babies. The Constitution was written to protect the rights of every American - this includes the most vulnerable. I hope the ruling is appealed ASAP. https://www.washingtonpost.com/health/2019/03/26/north-carolinas-week-abortion-ban-is-unconstitutional-federal-judge-rules/?fbclid=IwAR2w4VBue_XT22F7xGKMSq0g_zOaL6RWCHdNdPiydTp6ariRfzWrOJ7UDEM&utm_term=.e81817f85093 …
My bill with @RepStephenLynch just passed unanimously - more on this to come. #StayTuned https://twitter.com/FinancialCmte/status/1110628001555853313 …

I had a very full office earlier today as members of @AIPAC came by to meet with me in my office. We discussed important policy issues facing Israel and how we must continue to fight anti-Semitism across the country and the world. Thank you for taking the time to stop by. pic.twitter.com/oXMNDIHugE
I am proud to stand with Israel. Thank you to North Carolina AIPAC members for the warm welcome tonight. pic.twitter.com/raoRd7pcvi

"After 675 days, the Mueller investigation into President Trump is now over. Special Counsel Mueller and his team interviewed or heard testimony from nearly 500 individuals. The conclusion of this investigation is clear - there was no collusion." Full statement below. pic.twitter.com/M2Y25L32h7

It was a pleasure to tour Sygenta and meet with their leadership team and researchers in Greensboro. They are doing important work in #NC13 to help farmers everywhere through crop protection. I also enjoyed the employee town hall with constituents who work at the company. pic.twitter.com/lK8x5NAeG6

I enjoyed visiting Kooks Headers and Exhaust yesterday in Statesville. Kooks builds high quality headers with the goal of providing excellent service. They’ve recently invested in new technology and continue to hire new employees. Thanks for having me! pic.twitter.com/ijgQXTvNmW
I was one of 13 original members on a bill last month that called for us to recognize Israel's sovereignty over the Golan Heights. 2/2

.@realDonaldTrump sent a strong message to the world yesterday in his public support for changing US policy towards the Golan Heights. This is a bold and necessary move. Israel’s northern border is under threat by Iran and their terrorist proxies on a daily basis. 1/2

I am meeting right now with Betty who has worked in the social security arena for 38 years. We are discussing online reforms to the payment portion of social security. I always enjoy spending time with constituents. Please contact my office if you’d like to setup a meeting. #NC13 pic.twitter.com/sBg6ivnuGI

Enjoying my morning at Tilley Harley-Davidson for their monthly coffee with veterans in Salisbury. Their stories always have a major impact on me. Thank you all for your service and sacrifice to our country. #NC13 pic.twitter.com/kpaXPkrnEe

Selex ES is a is a leader in air traffic management, law enforcement, and communications technologies and they’re right here in #NC13. The company delivers solutions for government agencies, the armed forces, and commercial and industrial operators working to secure our country. pic.twitter.com/oc6xQjHK1U

I just finished a great visit with @GuilfordCollege president Jane Fernandes. We discussed the history of the college and diversity among the student body. We also talked about their effort to give students the #GuilfordEdge after graduation in order to find employment quickly. pic.twitter.com/0VwQcxFGt8

Thank you to High Point Mayor Jay Wagner and City Council Members for visiting our office in Washington, DC today.  They updated me on the 2019 federal legislative priorities as well as all the great things going on in High Point. pic.twitter.com/XxldG8CwkW

I appreciate some of my Democratic colleagues who've spoken out against @IlhanMN's anti-Semitism in the past few days. She's only been in Congress for a few months but has already made clear her disdain for the Jewish people.

I agree with @RepLeeZeldin. We should vote on H.Res.72, which Rep. Zeldin, @RepStefanik and I led. We also have an op-ed just released in @thehill rejecting anti-Semitism and hatred toward Israel. I was honored once again to receive the True Blue award from Family Research Council Action (@FRCAction). This award is given to members of Congress who support faith, family, and religious freedom through our voting record. My record shows unwavering support for the unborn. pic.twitter.com/js5uZs2eW7
